Normal disposition; sac'd due to ulcerated tumor and tumor size. T1 - behind left ear; T2- nape of neck
Brain and skull were in tact.
T1- 3 cryos and 1 cell line attempted; T2- 1 cryo, 1 cell line attempted
When performing necropsy I noticed that T1 and T2 had begun merging, although I could distinguish two tumors when I performed the last tumor measurements. I called it T1 and T2.
